title: Bills of lading and sea waybills (short-form page)
personalDataVerified: Shipper/consignee names, origin/destination ports, vessel name, booking number, container numbers
personalDataVisible: Link to full bill of lading (transaction parties only: shipper, consignee, carrier, customs; requires authentication)
rationale: Front-page critical fields verifiable at terminals. Prevents document fraud in shipping. Port inspectors can verify authenticity without accessing commercial cargo details unless authorized.
